name: Diabolos, "Violence" Bruce
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the start of your Ride Phase, until end of turn, you "Final Rush". (Specific units get a power up when you are in "Final Rush"!)[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Soul-Blast 5], and [Stand] all of your front row rear-guards.
flavor: Come at me seriously! Or you won't be able to withstand my full power!

name: Diabolos, "Anger" Richard
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [COST][put a rear-guard into your soul], and draw a card. [CONT](RC):If you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: A glimpse of wit amidst violence. The second son churns out victories with his intellect.

name: Diabolos, "Bad" Steve
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose a card from your soul, call it to your back row center (RC), and [Soul-Charge 1]. [CONT](RC):If you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Be it in the stadium or on the battlefield, the brothers are unstoppable.

name: Diabolos, "Innocent" Matt
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Never cowering in the face of enemies. That is "Diabolos".

name: Time-fissuring Fist Colossus
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [Soul-Charge 1]. Then, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.
flavor: The guardsman that maintains order during the match… may be putting it too highly.

name: Icicle Ein, Aizer
flavor: Supernatural powers are now also considered to be part of one's talent.

name: Steam Gunner, Brody
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Shoot at the pile that sticks out… did I get it wrong?

name: Acrobat Presenter
effect: [AUTO](RC): When this unit attacks or boosts, if your vanguard is "Diabolos, "Violence" Bruce", [Soul-Charge 1], and if you are in "Final Rush", [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: In the past and now, Dark States has been dominated by entertainment and decadence.

name: Psychic Prima, Miranda
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.
flavor: Do not underestimate her. She is a supernatural elite.

name: Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +100 Million until end of turn!
flavor: Follow my path. Power will dwell in your conviction to press on.

name: Diabolos Girls, Maimai
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] Trigger +1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: Can't we do it directly? These are just fireworks y'know?

name: Diabolos Boys, Jake
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: The waiting room for Diabolos is full of tension.

name: Diabolos Officer, Kilian
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: If we don't score here… you understand, right?

name: Diabolos Girls, Arianna
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)
flavor: This season's Gallows Bowl set new records for viewership.

name: Brothers' Soul
flavor: My soul-infused ball can't be stolen by the likes of you!
